txt.en: Dwarf mirrors can be found at Vâr Nuchur in Máttugard.\n\nYou should uncover the dwarf mirrors at Vâr Nuchur.

You have uncovered the dwarf mirrors at Vâr Nuchur, allowing the light to shine down upon the old garden beds. Those who seek to reclaim the Mountain-home will thank you for your part in restoring Máttugard to its former beauty.
Dwarf mirrors can be found at Vâr Nuchur in Máttugard.\n\nYou should uncover the dwarf mirrors at Vâr Nuchur.
Uncover the dwarf mirrors at Vâr Nuchur ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Uncovered the dwarf mirrors at Vâr Nuchur.

The royal gardens of Vâr Nuchur have been taken over by a hive of gredbyg. The insect hive covers the mirrors that once assisted in growing food in Máttugard. These mirrors should be cleared of the grodbog hives that have been constructed upon them, over the years.
Uncover the dwarf mirrors at Vâr Nuchur
The royal gardens of Vâr Nuchur, taken over by a hive of gredbyg, cover the mirrors that once assisted in growing food.
